alert.name: Safeguard - Can not track all operators
Safeguard - Total Warnings in last 5 minutes alert
SafeGuard - Total Errors in last 5 minutes alert
SafeGuard - [ALERT] Too close to be blocked alert

panels.description: Here we catch any risky metrics above certain percent of their thresholds. The idea is to simplify the simplify the dash maintenance by having single place for alerts of all charts bellow.
panels.title: [Alert] Too close to be blocked

alert.name: SafeGuard - [DANGER] Too close to be blocked alert (>90%)

panels.description: Here we catch any risky metrics above certain percent of their thresholds. The idea is to simplify the simplify the dash maintenance by having single place for alerts of all charts bellow.
panels.title: [DANGER] Too close to be blocked (>90%)

panels.description: When some metric reach its block threshold then the user/game/jackpot/operator will be blocked from the system. Later when it is unblocked it will still be displayed here but bellow the zero point
panels.title: [CRITICAL] Blocked - Safeguard - Call Dichev - NOW!
Extreme net loss in last 24 hours (cumulative, jackpot/bonuses are excluded)
Extreme net loss without the wins > £1000  in last 24 hours  (cumulative, jackpot/bonuses are excluded)
Extreme pure math loss in last 24 hours (cummulative, jackpot/bonuses are excluded): pure math loss = mplr = (payout-stake)/stake
Extreme gross loss from bonuses in last 24 hours
Extreme jackpot net loss in last 24 hours (cummulative)
Timed jackpot won more than once during its active period

panels.description: If the pot size is too high then when it is won the user AND the operator will be blocked because the jackpot thresholds will be reached. This must be avoided, so in this situation please increase all jackpot thresholds
panels.title: Jackpot pots size
